author: Naushad K. Cherrayil
title: Covid-19: It is risky for companies to put all production lines in one country
description: Countries will try to move manufacturing lines back domestically as more as possible but companies may consider new parameters when evaluating their investments
content:
Relocating manufacturing lines to another country is never an easy decision and manufacturers dont move production lines simply under the governments guidance.
Due to the rising trade war tensions between the US and China, and with many countries blaming Chi… [+5774 chars]
